name: Food Pals
description:
Dash, jump, roll and somersault your way through an amazing journey filled with tricks, traps, and hungry enemies.

Can you find all the hidden foods? They will follow you in a conga line if you do. But beware - the longer the line, the harder it will be to keep them all together.

- A platforming adventure with 38 levels
- Easy controls but deep platforming gameplay
- Unique rolling and conga line game mechanics
- Jazzy and vibrant polka soundtrack
- Syncs progress via iCloud across all your iOS devices
- Haptic feedback (compatible iOS device required)
- No ads or in-app purchases
